        public void doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
            throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Handles everything when there is posted something to the Servlet. 1. Writes everything to the local variables. 2. Puts them into the database. 3. Redirects to the normal page.
        Overrides:
        doPost in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                           java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Handles everything with the Labyrinth. 1. Prints the Labyrinth. 2. Set the Labyrinth with the values of the database. 3. Allow the user to change the field and calculate a new Path through the Labyrinth.

        request -

                               java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Writes every important variable which has to be saved in the ui database.
        Parameters:
        dimX - Defines the width of the field.
        dimY - Defines the height of the field.
        startNode - Defines the starting Node.
        endNode - Defines the ending Node.
        pathSize - Defines the size of the Path.
        path - Defines the Path as String.
